main.metaContent: Explore museums, galleries, aquariums, zoos and more around the world with virtual tours.
main.name: Name

welcome.text: You can select a place from the map or the list and start your virtual tour. You can also use filters to limit your search by place names, countries or types.

favorites.title: Favorite Places
favorites.warningTitle: YOU DON'T HAVE ANY FAVORITE PLACES!
favorites.warningText: You can create your favorite list from the places on the homepage.

faq.metaContent: Explore museums, galleries, aquariums, zoos and more around the world with virtual tours.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: The tours created by digitizing an existing place with different techniques are called virtual tours. It allows you to explore places from your computer, mobile phone or other devices at any time without actually going to that place.
faq.question2: I know a place with a virtual tour feature. Why is there not this place on your site?
faq.answer2: If you know beautiful places with virtual tour feature, please let us know. We will review your eligible requests as soon as possible and try to update the site.
faq.answer3: We use Google Analytics for the statistics of our site. Apart from this, we do not keep any information of users. Information of places visited is kept in users' own browsers. If the user wishes, they can delete the location information by deleting the data on the browser.

about.metaContent: Explore museums, galleries, aquariums, zoos and more around the world with virtual tours.
about.aboutText1: Explore museums, galleries, aquariums, zoos and more around the world with virtual tours.
about.aboutText2: If you have any suggestions or you know a good virtual place, please let us know.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
